医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调饮用水中 2,6-DHNP 造成的健康风险2,6-DHNP 是一组消毒副产物 (DBP)，为公共卫生敲响了警钟。水世界中的这些有害物质比许多其他污染物更顽强、毒性更大，因此传统的水清洁方法很难去除它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Research-highlights-health-risks-pose-by-26-DHNPs-in-drinking-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Research-highlights-health-risks-pose-by-26-DHNPs-in-drinking-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d143a90-8544-4c69-8b11-e0bd2c1396e3 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 09:42:02 -0400 Research highlights health risks posed by 2,6-DHNPs in drinking water
研究表明围产期抑郁症与经前疾病之间存在很强的双向关系根据 3 月 28 日发表在开放获取期刊 PLOS Medicine 上的研究，受经前疾病影响的女性比没有受经前疾病影响的女性患围产期抑郁症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Study-reveals-strong-bidirect-relationship- Between-perinatal-depression-and-premenstrual-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Study-reveals-strong-bidirect-relationship- Between-perinatal-depression-and-premenstrual-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=211d3362-a888-4df5-9bb0-62c09ad75e5c Fri, 29 Mar 2024 09:34:17 -0400 Study reveals strong bidirectional relationship between perinatal depression and premenstrual disorders
专家呼吁制定强制性室内空气质量标准以促进健康和经济莉迪亚·莫拉夫斯卡教授领导的国际专家组表示，应该制定强制性的室内空气质量标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Experts-call-for-mandatory-indoor-air-quality-standards-to-boost-health-and-economy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Experts-call-for-mandatory-indoor-air-quality-standards-to-boost-health-and-economy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c66b68b1-e46c-4b6f-af83-56c58013faf9 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 09:23:59 -0400 Experts call for mandatory indoor air quality standards to boost health and economy

你的医生还是你的保险公司？鲜为人知的规则可能会减轻 Medicare Advantage 的选择95 岁的巴特·克利昂 (Bart Klion) 和他的妻子芭芭拉 (Barbara) 一月份面临着一个艰难的选择：这对纽约州北部的夫妇得知，今年他们可以保留他们的私人医疗保险优惠计划，或者保留萨拉托加医院的医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Your-doctor-or-your-insurer-Little-known-rules-may-ease-the-choice-in-Medicare-Advantage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240329/Your-doctor-or-your-insurer-Little-known-rules-may-ease-the-choice-in-Medicare-Advantage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dcabdf3-0334-406a-a1ab-ffe90e07667d Fri, 29 Mar 2024 06:53:02 -0400 Your doctor or your insurer? Little-known rules may ease the choice in Medicare Advantage
